description: Finastra has confirmed it warned customers of a cybersecurity incident after a threat actor began selling allegedly stolen data on a hacking forum. [...]
title: Fintech giant Finastra investigates data breach after SFTP hack

description: MITRE has shared this year's top 25 list of the most common and dangerous software weaknesses behind more than 31,000 vulnerabilities disclosed between June 2023 and June 2024. [...]
title: MITRE shares 2024's top 25 most dangerous software weaknesses

description: The U.S. Justice Department has charged five suspects believed to be part of the financially motivated Scattered Spider cybercrime gang with conspiracy to commit wire fraud. [...]
title: US charges five linked to Scattered Spider cybercrime gang

description: Five local privilege escalation (LPE) vulnerabilities have been discovered in the needrestart utility used by Ubuntu Linux, which was introduced over 10 years ago in version 21.04. [...]
title: Ubuntu Linux impacted by decade-old 'needrestart' flaw that gives root

description: ​Microsoft says a Windows 24H2 bug causes game audio to unexpectedly increase to full volume when using USB DAC sound systems. [...]
title: Microsoft confirms game audio issues on Windows 11 24H2 PCs

description: Cybercriminals have devised a novel method to cash out from stolen credit card details linked to mobile payment systems such as Apple Pay and Google Pay, dubbed 'Ghost Tap,' which relays NFC card data to money mules worldwide. [...]
title: New Ghost Tap attack abuses NFC mobile payments to steal money

description: Amazon, Amazon Music, and Audible, an Amazon-owned online audiobook and podcast service, have been flooded with bogus listings that push dubious "forex trading" sites, Telegram channels, and suspicious links claiming to offer pirated software. [...]
title: Amazon and Audible flooded with 'forex trading' and warez listings
